name: Topdown Tiles
description: You are a nameless hero who appears at the outskirts of a ruined town.  The town is overrun by the undead, and people are running everywhere, in a panic.  Features 45+ skills, and a skill-based system, a working inventory, and potion drinking with various harmful and helpful effects.  Almost every action, from talking, fighting, drinking potions, to picking up treasure relies on a skill.  The game continues until you die.
